member.name: T:Sooda.SoodaObjectFilter
member.summary: Predicate that returns true when obj matches some condition and should be included in object list.

member.name: T:Sooda.SoodaSerializeOptions
member.summary: Specifies options for serializing transactions and objects to XML.

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSerializeOptions.DirtyOnly
member.summary: Serialize dirty fields only.

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSerializeOptions.IncludeNonDirtyFields
member.summary: Include non-dirty fields in serialization output. They will be marked as dirty="false".

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSerializeOptions.IncludeNonDirtyObjects
member.summary: Include non-dirty objects in serialization output. They will be marked as dirty="false".

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSerializeOptions.IncludeDebugInfo
member.summary: Include additional debug information in serialization output. It will be ignored during deserialization.

member.name: T:Sooda.SoodaSnapshotOptions
member.summary: Specifies options for creation of object list snapshots using GetList().

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSnapshotOptions.Default
member.summary: Use default options - load data from database, apply changes made within transaction.

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSnapshotOptions.NoTransaction
member.summary: Don't apply changes made in transaction. Use this option to perform a database snapshot or when you're sure that none of transaction objects will affect the result. This helps speed things a bit.

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSnapshotOptions.NoWriteObjects
member.summary: Don't precommit modified objects

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSnapshotOptions.VerifyAfterLoad
member.summary: Verify objects loaded from the database whether they actually match the where clause.

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSnapshotOptions.KeysOnly
member.summary: Load only the primary key values. Objects will be materialized but fields other than primary keys will require a database query.

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSnapshotOptions.Cache
member.summary: Load the collection items from cache if possible.

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSnapshotOptions.NoCache
member.summary: Store the collection in cache after loading from the database.

member.name: F:Sooda.SoodaSnapshotOptions.PrefetchRelated
member.summary: Use prefetch definition from the schema to load related objects automatically
